titleStmt.title: A true relation of that vvhich lately hapned to the great Spanish fleet, and galeons of Terra Firma in America With many strange deliueries of captaines, and souldiers in the tempest, and other remarkable accidents, worthy the obseruation. Also, a catalogue of those persons of account, which eyther perished in this tempest, or were miraculously preserued. Faithfully translated out of the Spanish originall, as it is printed and published in Madrid, Sevil, Lishbone, and other places.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by George Eld] for Nathaniel Butter, Nicholas Bourne, and William Sheffard,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1475-1640"), and the British Library ("Early English newspapers").
